mapper.select: select o_id, o_price, o_type, o_posyfee, o_status, o_createtime, o_updatetime, o_paytime, o_consigntime, o_endtime, t_id, u_id, gid, test1, test2 from orders where o_id = #{oId}
mapper.insert: insert into orders(o_price, o_type, o_posyfee, o_status, o_createtime, o_updatetime, o_paytime, o_consigntime, o_endtime, t_id, u_id, gid, test1, test2) values (#{oPrice}, #{oType}, #{oPosyfee}, #{oStatus}, #{oCreatetime}, #{oUpdatetime}, #{oPaytime}, #{oConsigntime}, #{oEndtime}, #{tId}, #{uId}, #{gid}, #{test1}, #{test2})

insert into orders(o_price, o_type, o_posyfee, o_status, o_createtime, o_updatetime, o_paytime, o_consigntime, o_endtime, t_id, u_id, gid, test1, test2) values
(#{entity.oPrice}, #{entity.oType}, #{entity.oPosyfee}, #{entity.oStatus}, #{entity.oCreatetime}, #{entity.oUpdatetime}, #{entity.oPaytime}, #{entity.oConsigntime}, #{entity.oEndtime}, #{entity.tId}, #{entity.uId}, #{entity.gid}, #{entity.test1}, #{entity.test2})

insert into orders(o_price, o_type, o_posyfee, o_status, o_createtime, o_updatetime, o_paytime, o_consigntime, o_endtime, t_id, u_id, gid, test1, test2) values
(#{entity.oPrice}, #{entity.oType}, #{entity.oPosyfee}, #{entity.oStatus}, #{entity.oCreatetime}, #{entity.oUpdatetime}, #{entity.oPaytime}, #{entity.oConsigntime}, #{entity.oEndtime}, #{entity.tId}, #{entity.uId}, #{entity.gid}, #{entity.test1}, #{entity.test2})
on duplicate key update o_price = values(o_price), o_type = values(o_type), o_posyfee = values(o_posyfee), o_status = values(o_status), o_createtime = values(o_createtime), o_updatetime = values(o_updatetime), o_paytime = values(o_paytime), o_consigntime = values(o_consigntime), o_endtime = values(o_endtime), t_id = values(t_id), u_id = values(u_id), gid = values(gid), test1 = values(test1), test2 = values(test2)
mapper.update:
update orders
o_price = #{oPrice},
o_type = #{oType},
o_posyfee = #{oPosyfee},
o_status = #{oStatus},
o_createtime = #{oCreatetime},
o_updatetime = #{oUpdatetime},
o_paytime = #{oPaytime},
o_consigntime = #{oConsigntime},
o_endtime = #{oEndtime},
t_id = #{tId},
u_id = #{uId},
gid = #{gid},
test1 = #{test1},
test2 = #{test2},
where o_id = #{oId}
